page.title: 20SIDDINGTON'S WILDWOOD PARK
page.content: On a 5 acre field,once a Rugby field, close to Wildwood House 1.5km SE of Cirencester is Wildwood Park which is a residential mobile home site.It was opened in 1966 and now there are 70 mobile homes on the site.Many young marrieds live in mobile homes as they are a cheaper first home than a house. A typical caravan on this site has a lounge,bathroom,kitchen and 2 bedrooms Cooking is by bottled gas and lighting by electricity.There are problems when you live in a mobile home. They are a good deal smaller than a house so you have to be tidy!They can be very cold in Winter and hot in Summer,rain seeps in and condensation,damp and invasions by insects are other problems.******** Chesterton C.P.School,Classes 6 & 8 ** *Maj.Barrington-Browne*A.Brazier****** *P.Gingell*M.Harding*J.Hill*W.H.Irving *V.Nicholas***************************
